entry.title: Room 08
entry.summary:
Author: Abrecedabrah

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,492Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: One of Chan's best friends, Jisung, just came out, and had a crush. And his crush wasn't some cute guy he saw twice and dreams about holding hands with. No, that would be too basic, too simple. And Jisung was many things, but basic was not one of them. No, Jisung's crush was the school's resident bad boy, Lee Minho. And Chan, although groaning internally about it, has decided to help him get the guy.What nobody knows, apart from Hyunjin (but he never told anyone, not even Minho) is that Minho is also gay. Like, very gay. But not for Jisung. No, he liked a hard-working, curly-haired, dimpled man called Bang Christopher Chan.
